#BlackMagicCraft #Episode187

GET THE TEMPLATE: https://www.drivethrurpg.com/product/308321/SCIFI-DOOR-TEMPLATE

This modular sci fi door is great for a variety of futuristic tabletop RPG's. You could also take some of the ideas and apply them to full builds for skirmish games or dioramas.
